Name: Jacob
About the game: Jacob: a free and simple puzzle game/experience with a scientific twist - it's evidence-based, using research on societal inequalities to determine game difficulty. Features • Incorporation of real research findings into gameplay - a simple control scheme with quick play-through. • Leaderboard - players build a population of scores which reflect socioeconomic difficulty, game skill, and random chance. • Awe-inspiring silhouette landscapes. • Beautiful and uplifting soundtrack.
